text.section: A farm bureau may be incorporated in each county.
Farm bureaus may acquire, by gift or purchase, real and personal property and may exercise all powers necessary or convenient to successfully carry out the objects of farm bureaus.
Farm bureau corporations shall not declare dividends.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42d-1, 42d-5, 42d-8.
